price: 29. Kuwa gaalooba waxay odhan: Rabbigayow! Na tus kuwii na lumiyey oo jin iyo insiba lahaa si aanu u marinno cagahayaga hoosteeda, oo ay u noqdaan halka ugu hooseeysa (Naarta)11.
arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ رَبَّنَآ أَرِنَا ٱلَّذَيۡنِ أَضَلَّانَا مِنَ ٱلۡجِنِّ وَٱلۡإِنسِ نَجۡعَلۡهُمَا تَحۡتَ أَقۡدَامِنَا لِيَكُونَا مِنَ ٱلۡأَسۡفَلِينَ
footnotes: 11. Halka u hooseysa dabaqyada Naarta. Ama macnaha waa si aan cagta u marinno oo ugu dul soconno aar goosi ahaan.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: waqāla alladhīna kafarū rabbanā arinā alladhayni aḍallānā mina al-jini wal-insi najʿalhumā taḥta aqdāminā liyakūnā mina al-asfalīna
